# Preparation

Following [a workshop by Przemyslaw Biecek at the 2018 useR! conference](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vPxQpMCnPE0). [Materials for the talk](https://github.com/pbiecek/DALEX_docs/tree/master/workshops/UseR2018) are available on GitHub.

Install the packages we need.

```{r install-pkg, eval=FALSE}
install.packages(
  c( "DALEX", "breakDown", "ceterisParibus",
     "live", "randomForest", "auditor")
)
```

Load the packages.

```{r load-pkg, eval=FALSE}
library("DALEX")
library("breakDown")
library("ceterisParibus")
library("live")
library("randomForest")
library("auditor")
```
